column2: ggplot(df_labels) + geom_point(aes(Time, Acceleration, color = Labels, shape = Labels, size = Labels)) +
xlab("Time (s)") + ylab("Sum of absolute components of wrist acceleration (g)") +

ylim(0, ymax_labels) + xlim(0, real_time_mvt[20,1] + 100) + geom_vline(xintercept = real_time_mvt[1,1], color = "black") + geom_vline(xintercept = real_time_mvt[2,1], color = "blue") + geom_vline(xintercept = real_time_mvt[3,1], color = "black") + geom_vline(xintercept = real_time_mvt[4,1], color = "blue") + geom_vline(xintercept = real_time_mvt[5,1], color = "black") + geom_vline(xintercept = real_time_mvt[6,1], color = "blue") + geom_vline(xintercept = real_time_mvt[7,1], color = "black") + geom_vline(xintercept = real_time_mvt[8,1], color = "blue") + geom_vline(xintercept = real_time_mvt[9,1], color = "black") + geom_vline(xintercept = real_time_mvt[10,1], color = "blue") + geom_vline(xintercept = real_time_mvt[11,1], color = "black") + geom_vline(xintercept = real_time_mvt[12,1], color = "blue") + geom_vline(xintercept = real_time_mvt[13,1], color = "black") + geom_vline(xintercept = real_time_mvt[14,1], color = "blue") + geom_vline(xintercept = real_time_mvt[15,1], color = "black") + geom_vline(xintercept = real_time_mvt[16,1], color = "blue") + geom_vline(xintercept = real_time_mvt[17,1], color = "black") + geom_vline(xintercept = real_time_mvt[18,1], color = "blue") + geom_vline(xintercept = real_time_mvt[19,1], color = "black") + geom_vline(xintercept = real_time_mvt[20,1], color = "blue")
